## WorkspaceAudio.setMuted() method

**Signature:**

```typescript
setMuted(muted: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  muted | boolean | If true, mute sounds. Otherwise, play them. |

**Returns:**

void
